pr_title: [Build scripts] make the project compile with jdk13

timeline.message:
make apollo-runtime an implementation dependency since it's used by
apollo-android-support
add the appropriate classpath to the android javadoc task

timeline.bodyText: Not sure why this was compileOnly before
timeline.author: martinbonnin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -22,7 +22,6 @@ android {
 dependencies {
   api(project(":apollo-normalized-cache-sqlite")) // TODO remove with removal of deprecated ApolloSqlHelper
   implementation(kotlin("stdlib"))
-  compileOnly(project(":apollo-runtime"))
-  compileOnly(project(":apollo-api"))
+  implementation(project(":apollo-runtime"))

replies.bodyText: This module has bunch of different stuff before. It included the Sqlite cache. Only reason that I can think of would be that some features work without runtime. But tbh, I don't think so. It is probably unnecessary.
replies.author: tasomaniac

replies.bodyText: I think it was a mistake from day 0, might was thinking that without runtime you won't be able to use this module so dependency to runtime already was present in user's build configuration, but yeah no reason.
replies.author: sav007
